title: Crypto platform 3Commas confirms major API breach, FBI to investigate
description: Ten thousand API keys were leaked, with more to come, the attackers say.

title: Netgear Wi-Fi routers need to be patched immediately
description: A serious flaw, allowing a myriad of attacks, was found affecting almost a dozen Netgear Wi-Fi routers.

title: Nvidia RTX 4070 Ti GPU rumored price is predictably weighty
description: We were keeping our fingers crossed for a more affordable price tag, but that could still happen...

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (December 30)
description: From highly anticipated dramas to nonlinear heist thrillers, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: Tech giants’ data centers could soon be warming your home
description: Data centers in Europe are using excess heat to warm public homes, reducing demand for fossil fuels and carbon dioxide emissions.

title: Got a new heart rate monitor? Here's how it'll change your workouts in 2023
description: Ultra-marathon swimmer and extreme adventurer Ross Edgley talks up the benefits of using a heart rate monitor when exercising.

title: Alibaba reshuffles top execs following cloud outage and US scrutiny
description: Alibaba has announced a change to its top roles as it recovers from a major Hong Kong server outage.

title: Google Home speakers could have been hijacked to spy on your conversations
description: Flaw in Google Home mini speakers could add new accounts to the device and eavesdrop on owners.

title: iPhone 15 tipped for better battery life thanks to new Apple A17 chip
description: Apple chip partner TSMC says that its next-gen processors are going to offer significant efficiency improvements.

title: Intel in 2022: year in review
description: We evaluate Intel’s performance over the year, from Raptor Lake CPUs to the debacle of the Arc GPU launch.
